verses.text: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy stumblingblocks \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* moved.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*: \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* judgement, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H1288"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H1288"\w*.

Strengthen \w yourselves|strong="H5375"\w*, \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3389"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, hast thou \w then|strong="H1961"\w* deceived \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w and|strong="H3389"\w* behold \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* reacheth \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*?
